Package heif.boxes

Classes for parsing and representing individual HEIF-structured boxes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuxiliaryTypePropertyBox
    Represents the auxc (Auxiliary Type Property Box), providing auxiliary image type information.
    Box
    Represents a generic HEIF Box, according to ISO/IEC 14496-12:2015.
    ColourInformationBox
    This derived class handles the Box identified as colr - Colour information Box.
    DataInformationBox
    This derived Box class handles the Box identified as dinf - Data Information Box.
    DataInformationBox.DataEntryBox
    An inner class used to store a DataEntryBox object, containing information such as URL location and name.
    DataInformationBox.DataReferenceBox
    An inner class designed to fill up the dref box type.
    FileTypeBox
    The FileTypeBox must be the first box in every HEIF-based file, including HEIC still image files.
    FullBox
    This code creates a complete class that stores ubiquitous high-level data applicable for the majority of the derived Box objects, serving as the complete primary header box.
    HandlerBox
    This derived box, namely the hdlr type, declares media type of the track, and the process by which the media-data in the track is presented.
    ImageRotationBox
    This derived Box class handles the Box identified as irot - Image rotation Box.
    ImageSpatialExtentsProperty
    This derived Box class handles the Box identified as ispe - Image spatial extents Box.
    ItemDataBox
    This derived Box class handles the Box identified as idat - Item Data Box.
    ItemInformationBox
    Represents the iinf (Item Information Box), which describes items within the HEIF file.
    ItemInformationBox.ItemInfoEntry
    Represents an infe (Item Info Entry) box inside an iinf box.
    ItemLocationBox
    The ItemLocationBox class handles the HEIF Box identified as iloc (Item Location Box).
    ItemLocationBox.ExtentData
    Represents a single extent entry in the ItemLocationBox.
    ItemLocationBox.ItemLocationEntry
    Represents one item entry, holding multiple extents.
    ItemPropertiesBox
    Represents the iprp (Item Properties Box) in a HEIF/HEIC file structure.
    ItemPropertiesBox.ItemPropertyContainerBox
    Represents the ipco (ItemPropertyContainerBox), a nested container holding an implicitly indexed list of item property boxes.
    ItemPropertyAssociationBox
    Represents the ipma (Item Property Association Box) in HEIF/ISOBMFF files.
    ItemPropertyAssociationBox.ItemPropertyEntry
    Represents a single item's property associations in the ipma box.
    ItemPropertyAssociationBox.ItemPropertyEntryAssociation
    Represents a single association between an item and a property.
    ItemProtectionBox
    This derived Box class handles the Box identified as ipro - Item Protection Box.
    ItemProtectionBox.ProtectionSchemeInfoBox  
    ItemReferenceBox
    Represents the iref (Item Reference Box) in HEIF/ISOBMFF files.
    ItemReferenceBox.SingleItemTypeReferenceBox
    Represents a SingleItemTypeReferenceBox resource, which stores a group of item references of a specific type.
    MetaBox
    Represents a MetaBox meta structure in HEIF/ISOBMFF files.
    PixelInformationBox
    Represents the pixi (Pixel Information Box), which provides bit depth and number of channels for a reconstructed image.
    PrimaryItemBox
    Represents the pitm (Primary Item Box) in HEIF/ISOBMFF files.

Package heif.boxes Description

Classes for parsing and representing individual HEIF-structured boxes.

This package includes definitions for standard and proprietary HEIF box types.

Since:
July 2025
Author:
Trevor Maggs
